title: Keep getting Disconnected
body:
This has been happening to me for a while. Very frequently, in game, my game will become unresponsive and lag even though my ping stays at 40. Eventually it will tell me "Attempting to Reconnect" and I do reconnect, however, by that time I have either died or I've been afk in base or under tower.

Has this happened to anyone else? If so, how did you fix it (or did you even fix it)?

replies.body: It sounds like your network is having trouble maintaining a connection and causing you to get kicked off.  The game requires a constant connection, so if it can't communicate information to you then you'll have delays or issues like this.  I recommend going over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide which will provide a series of steps to get this fixed up.  Hopefully, this will get you back in game!
